extension.description: This pluging alerts the user to choose the right option in customhtml view in administration part, which is : From under menu assignment tab ,from module assignment select options, YOU MUST CHOOSE ONLY ON THE PAGES SELECTED OPTION. Designed by KWProductions Co.
